extraRewards.title: Master Specific Rewards
extraRewards.description: Weapons dropped in Master are Adept variants

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are two hidden chests that award anything you've already acquired

typeModifiers.name: Champion Foes
typeModifiers.description: You will face Overload and Unstoppable Champions. You must equip Anti-Overload and Anti-Unstoppable mods to your arms armor to defeat them

typeModifiers.name: Match Game
typeModifiers.description: Enemy shields are highly resistant to all unmatched elemental damage

encounters.title: The Door
encounters.description: Kill Savathûn's projection to open the door

encounters.title: The Boat
encounters.description: Get to the Pyramid entrance. Kill the Knowledge Bearers to spawn crystals that give you Knowledge buffs and deposit those buffs at the boat. The boat will make a couples of stops on the way to the Pyramid, you'll need to do this each time

encounters.title: Acquisition
encounters.description: Shoot all the symbols on the pillars correctly. Find the room with the symbol shown on each of the three pillars in the area. Kill the Glyphkeeper inside to spawn a symbol you'll need for the Obelisk. Do this x3 and shoot all three symbols on the Obelisk that has them all. You'll need to this x3 to continue

encounters.title: The Caretaker
encounters.description: Defeat the Caretaker. Gather symbols in the room and shoot the corresponding ones on the Obelisk right outside of it while also stunning The Caretaker before he reaches the Obelisk. Once all the symbols are gathered and shot, damage phase will start. Do this each time for every level you progress onto

encounters.title: Jumping Puzzle
encounters.description: Make your way to the next encounter. Don't fall

encounters.title: Exhibition
encounters.description: Fight your way to the end. Kill both the Taken and Scorn Glyphkeepers to reveal symbols you'll need to shoot at the door at the back of the area your in. Make sure to kill the Disciple's Hourglass Taken Knight to extend your time. Clear all three areas to advance.

encounters.title: Rhulk, Disciple of the Witness
encounters.description: Kill Rhulk. Defeat each Glyphkeeper on both sides of the room to spawn the initial symbols. You will need the Leeching or Emanating Force buff and someone without it to see symbols on each side. Find the Obelisk with the symbol you need and use the Emanating Force to deposit it in that Obelisk; do this x6 times to move up to Rhulk. Shoot his glaive to reveal the symbol you need and deposit in the correct Obelisk with your Emanating Force, then shot his crit spot. Once all crit spots are shot, it's onto damage phase.

name: Deep Stone Crypt
description: The chains of legacy must be broken

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are two hidden chests that award anything you've already acquired

encounters.title: Sparrow Run
encounters.description: Sparrow your way thru to the end in which you'll find a door. Make sure to stop at the bubbles along the way so you get rid of the Frostbite debuff; x10 will kill you

encounters.title: Crypt Security
encounters.description: Shoot the main fuses in each room in a specific order. The Operator will you allow you shoot the panels downstairs found by using the Scanner to see which panels need to be activated from upstairs in each room (Light & Dark). Doing this correctly will start damage phase and allow you to shoot the fuses

encounters.title: Atraks-1, Fallen Exo
encounters.description: Find the real Atraks-1 and destroy him. Use the Scanner to find which Atraks-1 copy is the real one after killing all the Servitors then use the Operator to reset the Replication debuff

encounters.title: Disarmament
encounters.description: Deposit the nuclear cores into the bins at the center. Find the correct bin with Scanner, shoot the glowing terminals to spawn the cores with Operator and stun Taniks with Suppressor so you can deposit the cores. Rinse and repeat and watch for Overload champions

encounters.title: Taniks, The Abomination
encounters.description: Defeat Taniks. Similar to the previous encounter, deposit the cores by damaging Taniks' thrusters and use the Scanner to find which bins to deposit them in. Operator will shoot orbs that spawn on the core carries and Suppressor will stun Taniks. After 4 cores are deposited, you'll start damage phase

extraRewards.title: Challenge Rewards
extraRewards.description: Completing the weekly challenge will award you the Timelost variant of the weapon for that week

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are four hidden chests that award anything you've already acquired

typeModifiers.name: Champion Foes
typeModifiers.description: You will face Barrier and Overload Champions. You must equip Anti-Barrier and Anti-Overload mods to your arms armor to defeat them

typeModifiers.name: Match Game
typeModifiers.description: Enemy shields are highly resistant to all unmatched elemental damage

encounters.title: Open the Vault
encounters.description: Open the door to the Vault of Glass. Hold each of the three plates while defeating enemies before they reach them until the door opens

encounters.title: Jumping Puzzle
encounters.description: Work your way down to the next encounter

encounters.title: Confluxes
encounters.description: Defend the Confluxes. Kill all the enemies before they reach them and sacrifice themselves to the confluxes. You'll have three waves of encounters with 1, then 2, and then lastly 3 confluxes to defend

encounters.title: Oracles
encounters.description: Destroy the oracles. The oracles will spawn twice around the area in a certain order. The first time they spawn will be to denote the order they spawn in, then the second time is to destroy them in that exact order. You'll have five waves here first with 3 oracles, then 4, then 5, then 6, and finally 7

encounters.title: Templar
encounters.description: Kill the Templar. Destory the oracles in the correct order they spawn in at, then you take down the Templar's shield with the Relic to begin damage. He'll relocate and spawn somewhere else around the area which can be blocked by standing in the ring he is about to spawn at. If you do not get there in time, you'll have to repeat the process to start dealing damage again

encounters.title: Gorgon's Labyrinth
encounters.description: Get passed the Gorgon's without being spotted. If you get spotted, they will enrage and wipe the team

encounters.title: Another Jumping Puzzle
encounters.description: Platform your way to the final encounter

encounters.title: Gatekeeper
encounters.description: Defened the pillars. Open the portals by standing on the plates. Once they're open, prevent the Vex from sacrificing themselves to the pillars inside each of the portals. You'll need the Relic to remove the Praetorian's shield and defeat them. Keep doing this until a conflux spawns in the center of the area and then continue to defend it

encounters.title: Atheon, Time's Conflux
encounters.description: Defeat Atheon. Three players randomly will be teleported to another area, and the others will stay in the main area. The players in the main area must open the portal to where the others are. The ones who were teleported must shoot the oracles in the order the players in the main area see them at. Once thats done correclty three times, the portal will open and the players who were teleported can come back to the main area and start damage on Atheon

name: Garden of Salvation
description: The Garden calls out to you

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are two hidden chests that award anything you've already acquired

encounters.title: Evade the Consecrated Mind
encounters.description: Evade the boss. Gather Voltaic Overflow from the boss as it moves from one area to the next by tethering from the pillars to the shields while also killing the Angelic's to open the next area. The last area will be filled with ads so full sprint to the end

encounters.title: Platforming Puzzle
encounters.description: Jump and jump your way to the next encounter

encounters.title: Summon the Consecrated Mind
encounters.description: Defend the bases. Kill the Angelic enemies and the other enemies around each base while tethering from the pillars to the center shields to slowly bring them down. You'll need the Enlightened buff to damage the shielded enemies. Keep this going until you advance to the next encounter

encounters.title: Defeat the Consecrated Mind
encounters.description: Kill the Consecrated Mind. Follow the boss around to pick up the square it drops and shoot out the eyes that are lit up on it. Simultaneously defeat the Minotaurs to gather the motes they drop. Deposit those motes into one of the pillars that are lit up, then it's onto damage phase

encounters.title: Another Platforming Puzzle
encounters.description: Yet another platforming route to the last encounter

encounters.title: Defeat the Sanctified Mind
encounters.description: Kill the Sanctified Mind. Collect motes from each portal that spawns in (orange and blue) by killing the enemies in that area you get transported to. Deposit those motes into the pillars in the main area while also defending the pillars from enemies. After you've gathered 30 motes on each pillar, you can tether them to the boss and start damage

extraRewards.title: Hidden Chests
extraRewards.description: There are four hidden chests that awards random gear

encounters.title: Jumping Puzzle
encounters.description: Find your way to the first encounter

encounters.title: Kalli, The Corrupted
encounters.description: Defeat Kalli. Find the plates around the room with symbols that match the ones located in the center. Standing on the plate for a small amount of time will spawna Knight that will need to be defeated. Once all the plates are cleared, return to the center to deal damage to Kalli. Hide in the rooms in the sunken area to avoid Kalli's wipe mechanic. Rinse and repeat

encounters.title: Another Jumping Puzzle
encounters.description: Jump your way to the next fight

encounters.title: Shuro Chi, The Corrupted
encounters.description: Defeat Shuro Chi. Defeat the ads leading up to Shuro Chi, collect the Eye of Riven, then stand on each of the plates around Shuro Chi and use the Eye of Riven to link everyone together to remove her shields; you can then start damaging her. Continue following Shuro Chi to the next area she spawns at the repeat the process. You'll also run into a puzzle room where players will need to stand on the corresponding plates that match the incomplete pieces of the symbol in the room

encounters.title: Yet Another Jumping Puzzle
encounters.description: Continue making your way to the next encounter

encounters.title: Morgeth, The Spirekeeper
encounters.description: Defeat Morgeth. Collect the Taken Strength that spawns around the area and also kill the Eye of Rivens. Once all the Taken Strength's are gathered you'll be able to start damage phase

encounters.title: The Vault
encounters.description: Open the Vault. Stand on the plates to reveal the symbols in the center and find the duplicates. You will also need to kill an Eye of Riven to collect it's Taken Essence that you will need to cleanse a plate. A Might of Riven will also spawn that can wipe your team should he get to the plate, so kill him. Repeat the process until all plates are cleansed

encounters.title: Riven of a Thousand Voices
encounters.description: Defeat Riven. In one room, collect Taken Essence by killing the Eye of Riven and then cleansing the correct symbol around the room with it. In the other room, damage Riven's tentacles/mouth until she flinches then two of her eyes will be glowing, remember them. The rooms will then switch objectives and now the room that has Riven will need to damage her mouth and shoot out the exact eyes that were glowing before. Repeat this process until you get back to the throne room. You'll keep flinching Riven and each time two of her eyes will be glowing, for a total of 6 eyes that you'll have to remember. Shoot Riven's mouth once it opens and then shoot out all 6 eyes that previously were glowing. If you didn't damage her enough, you'll do this entire process all over again. If you did, you'll be teleported to a jumping puzzle. Reach the top, grab the Taken Essence, and you'll be teleported back to the throne room. This is the final stand to kill Riven, but not really. Once you defeated her, run into her mouth and destroy her heart to finally complete this encounter

encounters.title: Riven's Heart
encounters.description: Flee with Riven's heart. One chosen player will pick up the heart first and continue forward. Once the player's time runs out, they will be teleported to another area and the next chosen player will have to pick up the heart. The players that are in the other area must clear ads and collect the beams of light when the timer gets low to extend the player's time who is carrying the heart. You will continue this process making your way back thru the raid until you reach the offering plate
